attributes.action: Unlock the country before it becomes a disproportionate interference
attributes.additional_details: These lockdown measure may now constitute a deprivation of liberty.  Impacting my freedom to maintain relationships.  Prevent the right of worship.  Are interfering with the political rights of association and assembly.  Are being indirectly discriminate against those with mental illness.  The closure of businesses will decrease our goodwill and children are being denied the basic minimum of education.
attributes.background: The government need to issue an exit plan to the Coronavirus lockdown as it has become a disproportionate interference to the British peoples Human Rights.
